sub_title: Disney+ International Product Strategy - Growth & Expansion
summary:
I have over 10 years of experience working with some of the most recognizable brands in the world. I spent 8 of those years in the tech industry scaling hyper-growth starts ups. I've started the Uber Eats or Disney+ business in more than 75 international countries. 

My work has primarily focused on markets in Europe, Africa, Middle East, United States with some attention to Latin America and APAC. From local marketing operations, international expansion, product, strategy and planning, I've covered most facets of the business in my career which serves as the foundation for my expertise in helping start ups scale their business across the globe. I'm people-oriented and can often uncover operational efficiencies backed by data that go overlooked due to my interpersonal observations and on-the-ground experience building businesses. I've been able to connect the dots across business units, markets and operational levers to unlock growth. Data is at the foundation of my decision-making.

Over the last 5 years I've also led diversity and inclusion work as the chair of an ERG that served as the connector between the employee community and executive leadership. In this role, I helped drive company-wide, business and internal strategies around DEI.

school.name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
Burch Honors Rwanda & The Hauge International Study

organizations.name: UberHUE EMEA (employee resource group celebrating Black diversity)

profile_positions.description:
Define the go-to-market product strategy for Disney+ as we expand across the globe, including strategic assessment of markets, competitive landscape and product possibilities 

Collaborate with engineers, legal, other product teams and business leaders to bring the product to life

Launch the service in markets across Europe, Latin America, Asia, The Caribbean and more, including; UK, France, Germany, Japan, South Korea, Hong Kong, Caribbean territories.
profile_positions.title: International Product Strategy - Growth & Expansion, Disney+

profile_positions.description:
Strategically evaluated new markets to add to the Uber Eats portfolio across Europe, Middle East and Africa from both a long-term investment and operational lens. 

Advised existing markets on data-backed, creative campaigns and strategies to achieve aggressive growth targets. These engagements or special projects tackled some of the businesses biggest operational and growth opportunities. For example, I led efforts across Egypt, Dubai and Saudi Arabia to prepare the business both operationally and strategically for Ramadan. I re-forecasted targets and developed growth plans for the month of observation.
profile_positions.title: International Expansion & Growth Strategy + Planning, Uber Eats

profile_positions.description:
Defined strategies and built operations from the ground up in new markets across Europe, Middle East and Africa to expand the Uber Eats footprint. This included developing consumer growth strategy for the first 3-6 months of operations, hiring teams to and collaborating with them on supply strategies and restaurant strategies, frequent on-the-ground visits and more to ensure everything was in place to start Uber Eats

Led go-to-market consumer growth strategy and managed operations for Uber Eats launch in the following cities:
- Amsterdam
- Brussels
- Milan
- Madrid
- Warsaw
- Riyadh
- Lisbon
- Cairo
- Nairobi

Ensured strategy was aligned with the global brand, but still localized enough to achieve aggressive growth targets with efficient economics

Worked across paid media, PR, owned and partner channels to ensure develop end-to-end strategy, then oversees a lean local team to ensure execution of the strategy

Spearheaded research and insights vertical, building foundational knowledge of Uber Eats brand in key EMEA Markets: London, Paris, Dubai + Johannesburg
profile_positions.title: EMEA Product Launcher, Uber Eats

profile_positions.description:
Founded Uber's Employee Resource Group focused on Black diversity, Uber Hue. Our mission is to create a network that celebrates Black diversity, culture, and inclusion amongst both our internal and external communities in EMEA. 

Served as the go-to collaborator with executives across Europe on HR, product, employee relations and more decisions impacting the community. Often helped review press releases, external comms and more with community and executives. 

I led the general body, team of 6 board members and executive sponsor to drive impactful change across the mega-region focused on three pillars:

- Professional Development
- Retention and Recruitment
- Internal + External Community Engagement
profile_positions.title: Founder/Co-Chair of Uber Hue EMEA Employee Resource Group

profile_positions.description:
Drove meaningful growth in Uber’s customer base within the Atlanta Metro area in owned and earned marketing channels while increasing ridership YoY for existing customers

Developed and negotiated integrated marketing campaigns for key partnerships and events with comprehensive digital, offline advertising, and experiential activations such as Uber X OUTKAST, uberMOVERS to provide moving services on-demand, talentPOOL with B.O.B to grow the uberPOOL product amongst students, as well as philanthropic causes for children’s and community organizations.

Project managed uberPOOL launch through local OOH, CRM, paid social, and programatic experimental advertising campaigns with internal and external stakeholders to drive scalable strategies

Rider engagement lead, provided strategy for adoption of regulations for ride-sharing through thoughtful marketing and advertising campaigns in Atlanta
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager, Uber - Atlanta
